title: Devasena Diamond Haaram Set with Matching Earrings
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut CZ Diamonds (American Diamonds)
and natural freshwater Pearls. Metal is hallmarked for gold purity.
features: This captivating Haaram showcases a classic South Indian design with a modern flair. The intricate leafy pattern necklace is studded with shimmering CZ diamonds, culminating in a grand pendant. The pendant features a circular design with a central Emerald cabochon surrounded by concentric circles of CZ diamonds. Ruby stones add pops of color, while delicate freshwater pearls enhance the elegance. The matching earrings echo the pendant's design, creating a harmonious set.
colors: Predominantly gold with the dazzling sparkle of diamonds
complemented by the vibrant green of the Emerald and the deep red of the Ruby. The pearls add a soft
occasions: and other special occasions like Seemantham (baby shower) or half-saree functions. This Haaram is also ideal for adding a touch of heritage to contemporary outfits at upscale events.
description: A true statement piece, this Devasena Haaram embodies the opulence of South Indian jewelry. The high-quality CZ diamonds provide exceptional brilliance at an accessible price point. The traditional design is versatile enough to be passed down through generations, making it a cherished heirloom. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine and durable finish. This set offers both cultural significance and contemporary appeal.
